General.Name: Dhipaya Group Holdings PCL
General.Description: Dhipaya Group Holdings Public Company Limited, an investment company, provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company also operates in land loan and consignment businesses. The company was incorporated in 1951 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
